caption:
TABLE 4. Model performance comparison with different 
locations of SCNN layer on tvtLANE testset #1 and #2.

Table 4. The 
results reveal that: (a) Compared with baseline models without 
SCNN layers, the embedding of SCNN layers really help to 
improve the models' performance, which further verifies the 
added-value of SCNN and accords with the aforementioned 
results in 1);
